name: erc20-test-deploy
description: This is a project aiming to test deploying ERC20 token smart contracts to different EVM-compatible networks. ## Techstack - [Metamask](https://metamask.io/) - [Solidity](https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/v0.8.18/) - [Hardhat](https://hardhat.org/) --- Additional - [Remix IDE](https://remix-project.org/) ## Supported Network - Local network - Ethereum (Goerli) - Fantom - Updating... ## Deployment Guideline ### Requirement
